expanded: first letter of alphabet, called [ⲁⲗⲫⲁ] [[S]] (PS 353, Br 124, Leyd 458, P 131^3 77, My 38) & [[B]] (Ap 1 8, K1, Stern p 418), [الفة]. As numeral = _one_ [[B]][[F]], rarely [[S]] (Br 127) except in semi-Gk documents.

headword: #[ⲁ-]# [[S]][[A]][[B]][[F]] verbal prefix derived from [ⲉⲓⲣⲉ], characterizes (_a_) perf, (_b_) pluperf, (_c_) aorist tenses, as (_a_)
#[ⲁ-]# [[S]][[A]][[B]][[F]] ([[B]] rare, [[A]] El 44), [ⲁⲩ-] [[B]], adv of indefiniteness, _about_; often with [ⲛ-] (rare [ⲛⲛ-]) prefixed; _v_ AZ 51 122.

expanded: vb *I.* intr, _increase_ in size, _advance_ in age:
nn f, meaning unknown: ST 389 they imprisoned me in village, [ⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲛⲟⲩ(ⲧⲉ) ⲙⲛⲛⲉⲧⲛϣⲗⲏⲗ ⲁⲏϯ ⲑⲉ ⲛⲁⲓ ⲁⲓⲛⲟⲩϩ ⲧⲁⲃⲉ ⲁⲓⲃⲱⲕ ⲛⲁⲓ] and am come to you. _L_ ? [ⲁⲃⲱ] or [ⲧⲁⲃⲉⲛⲛⲏⲥⲉ] or [ⲧⲁ-ⲃⲉ].
nn f, _drag net_ for fish or animals:
nn f [قلعة]. So AZ 24 88 (Bsciai). Cannot be traced. _Cf_ KKS 54. But MS seems to read [ⲃⲱ], _v_ [ϥⲟ].

headword: #[ⲁⲃⲱⲕ]# [[S]][[B]][[F]], seldom [ⲁⲃⲟⲕ] [[S]][[B]], [ⲉⲃⲱⲕ] DM, f [ⲁⲃⲟⲕⲉ] [[S]] (Ryl 63 1), [ⲁⲃⲟⲕⲓ] [[B]] (BSM 119, Cat 147), pl [ⲁⲃⲟⲟⲕⲉ] [[S]], [ⲁⲃⲁⲕⲉ] [[A]] )Pro 24 52, Zeph 2 14), [ⲁⲃⲟⲕⲓ] [[B]] (Va 57 271), [ⲁⲃⲁⲁⲕⲓ] [[F]] (Is 34 11), sg often as pl,

expanded: nn m, a stone, only Mor 52 13, where jewels likened to 12 apostles;

nn (?), _Monday_ (?): BM 872, 886, heading of Monday's Theotokia, [ⲑ. ⲛⲧⲉ ⲫⲟⲟⲩ ⲛⲁ.] [يوم الأثنين], P 44 186 [ⲫⲟⲩ ⲛⲁ.] do. Elsewhere Monday [[B]] [ⲡⲓⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲙⲙⲁϩⲃ̅] O'LearyTh 22, or [ⲡⲉϩ. ⲙⲡⲃ̅] Absal 159; [[S]] P 44 21 (from Theot.) [ⲡⲣⲁⲥⲧⲉ ⲃ̅] _Cf_ [ⲁⲩⲏⲧ] _sub fin_.
nn, prenuptial _marriage gift_ (_v_ Ryl Dem 3 268 n, AZ 55 74): Bodl(P) b 3 (= Petrie _Gizeh & Rifeh_ 42) marriage contract [ⲙⲛⲟⲩⲧⲣⲓⲙⲩⲥⲓⲟⲛ \(ⲛ\)ⲛⲟⲩϥ ⲛϣ.] _Cf_ p 427 _a_ [ϣ\(ⲉ\)ⲡ ⲧⲟⲟⲧ⸗] _sf_.
